title: Has California enacted a law that protects child molesters who rape children?
subtitle: A bill signed into law by Jove. Gavin Newsome leaves the judgement as to whether individuals convicted of certain sexual offences involving minors must register as perpetrators of sexual offences to the discretion of the court.
author: David Emery
vclaim: California Senate Act 145, signed by the California Government. In September 2020, the shields of child molesters who rape children from having to register as sexual offenders.
